data.name: Slogan
data.value: We are at your service to be one step ahead with our innovative projects.

data.name: AboutText1
data.value: Founded in 2010 inspired by the quarries in Carrara, Italy, our company set out with a passion to carry the raw beauty of natural stone to modern living spaces.

data.name: AboutText2
data.value: In our 7000 m² facility in Istanbul, we process the most exclusive marble blocks from around the world, blending state-of-the-art technology with traditional craftsmanship. For us, marble is not just a building material, but a story written by nature over millions of years.

data.name: HomeDescription
data.value: Holland Stone Marble Solution Partner; started its operations in Istanbul with the aim of being a solution partner in marble projects of companies providing architecture and consultancy services by combining marble with the architectural audience in high-level projects. It has been serving private and official institutions since its establishment. In its 2000 m2 warehouse in Ferhatpaşa and 5000 m2 warehouse in Sancaktepe Yenidoğan location, it provides sales of white marble, black marble, gray marble, brown marble, green marble, blue marble, semi-precious stones as well as porcelain slabs.

data.name: LetsBringProjectsToLife
data.value: Let's Bring Your Projects to Life

data.name: ContactFormDesc
data.value: Fill out the form and we will get back to you.

data.name: BlogDesc1
data.value: How to extend the life of your natural stones by protecting them from acidic cleaners? Here are tips from the expert.

data.name: BlogDesc2
data.value: Is white Carrara marble or dark colored granite fashionable in kitchens this year? The choice of interior designers.

data.name: BlogDesc3
data.value: The story of white gold spreading from Italy to the world, extending from Michelangelo's David statue to the present day.
